title: Invite and Earn Up to {{commission}}%

tooltips.commission-rate: You'll earn {{commission}}% of the platform fee generated from your referrals, for the first 6 months from their sign-up date
tooltips.max-commission: Maximum potential earnings from the platform fee generated through your referrals (this will be applicable for the first six months of the referral's lifetime).
tooltips.split-commission: Adjust the slider to pass on a portion of your referral earnings to your referrals. This value will affect only to new referrals.
tooltips.earn-success-fees: Earn a percentage of the platform fee generated through your referrals.
tooltips.invite-and-earn: Have {{ invite }} referrals sign up and invest in any service(s) of their choice, and earn {{ commission }}% of the platform fee generated in the first 6 months of the referral's lifetime.
tooltips.invite-and-earn-1-week: Have {{ invite }} referrals sign up and invest in any service(s) within 1 week, to earn {{ commission }}% of the platform fee generated in the first 6 months of the referral's lifetime.
tooltips.trader-boost: The trader shares {{ commission }}% of the success fee paid by your referrals in the first 6 months of the referral lifetime
tooltips.within-1-week: Multiply your rewards by 2, referring friends who invest in any service during your first week.
tooltips.within-1-week-unlocked: Boost unlocked! We have doubled your rewards when referring friends who invest in any service. Keep sharing and enjoy!
tooltips.base-commission: Base percentage of the referral commission from the platform fee generated through your referrals. More referrals = higher commission percentage!
tooltips.number-referrals: Number of referrals that invested in a service(s)

when-you-invite: when you invite {{invite}}+ people to Zignaly
get-by-inviting: Get <0>{{commission}}%</0> by inviting {{invite}} more people to Zignaly
get-by-inviting-in: Get <0>{{commission}}%</0> by inviting {{invite}} more people to Zignaly in:
split-commission: Split your commission with friends you invite
trader-referral-link: Your referral link to this trader:
earn-success-fees: Earn a % of success fees paid by people you invite
invite-and-earn-1-week: Invite {{invite}}+ people within 1 week and earn {{commission}}%
invite-and-earn-trader-boost: Invite {{invite}}+ people and earn {{commission}}% ({{commissionBefore}}% + {{multiplier}}x trader boost)
invite-count: Invite {{count}} people and get {{pct}}% of success fees
invite-generic: From everyone you invite to my trading service
